snippet.title: Mon-Yu - First Look Trailer (Various Platforms)
snippet.description:
Mon-YU is a JRPG dungeon crawler in the re-imagined experience of the original Wizardry - meaning that this will be a difficult game - even more so than Undernauts: Labyrinth of Yomi.  1st person, turn based dungeon crawler. Create your own characters to defeat the 7, yes 7, demon lords. Form your team, clear the dungeons, defeat the monsters, and claim victory.
-------------------------------------------
